replies.msg: 力架騎馬都係冇乜用腦

較曾勝利及劉維劼更在登陸本港賽馬的內地背景人士，有「京京千里」馬主劉玉文。他是藝人呂良偉的老友，於前年以850萬元，在本港馬匹拍賣會購入「京京千里」，當時廣為傳媒報道。上年劉玉文再用900萬元，在同一拍賣會投得「迢迢千里」，加上兩駒養馬費，至今他已於香港賽馬花費約2,000萬。

replies.msg:
消息刺激股價瘋狂炒上，收市急升逾117%，報6.8美元。

http://www.bbc.com/news/technology-42630136

Kodak is the latest in a series of companies to see its value jump after revealing plans for blockchain-related activity.

"This is a phenomenon we saw back during the dot com days in the late 1990s where traditional companies would mention some kind of internet strategy and their stock price would jump up," commented Garrick Hileman from the Cambridge Centre for Alternative Finance.

"When you see stock prices moving like this it does appear to be troubling - it's hard to say if there's a bubble but it certainly is indicative of a frothy investment market."
